attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am a keen Horse Rider and lover of all horses. I want to stop all horse slaughter and abuse in, Britan. My reason being it is a horrible habit and is not right. I have a quote I use and it helps me with my protest,
"Horses Took Us To War And What Do We Do? Take Them To Slaughter"
I Know horse slaughtering is a job for many people and pays. But money isnt ment to be made by killing animals. Slaughter being stopped may cause a major cost to socity but it isn't right! Please Act Now To Stop Slaughter!

Think of a horse running free.
Then Think Of A Horse Being Led Threw A Mincer!

Its Your Choice....
 Thank You xx
